page.title: 09Traffic in Kegworth.
page.content: In a recent traffic survey in{Kegworth 431 vehicles travelled along the{A6}in 30 mins. Of these 285 were cars and 146 were lorries or vans. For some people through traffic can be a nuisance. Dirt and dust can cause {pollution}and the traffic is dangerous for small children. In the last 2 yrs. a bus has run into a shop in the village centre and a lorry shed its load demolishing part of an old house on{London Road.}Fortunately injuries were slight but the danger is clearly there. Plans are being made for a {bypass}but if this happens garges will lose a lot of trade. The{bypass}will go from the{A6}Loughborough road, opposite the pub named the {White {House,}to join the{M1/A42}junction near Diseworth. Once completed the new road will ensure that no heavy lorries are allowed into the village.
